property.name: commands
property.property:
<property name="p" type="string" value="xfce4-display-settings --minimal"/> <property name="x" type="string" value="xkill"/>
<property name="f" type="string" value="thunar"/> <property name="space" type="string" value="rofi -show run"/> <property name="F1" type="string" value="rofi -show drun"/> <property name="Up" type="string" value="/home/arthur/.dotfiles/movescreen.py -r up"/> <property name="Return" type="string" value="xfce4-terminal"/> <property name="Alt_L" type="string" value="rofi -show window -selected-row 1 -config /home/arthur/.config/rofi/alt-tab-window-cycling.rasi"/> <property name="Down" type="string" value="/home/arthur/.dotfiles/movescreen.py -r down"/> <property name="l" type="string" value="systemctl suspend"/> <property name="p" type="string" value="xfconf-query -c xfce4-power-manager -p /xfce4-power-manager/presentation-mode -T"/> <property name="b" type="string" value="firefox"/> <property name="l" type="string" value="xfce4-session-logout"/>

property.name: xfwm4
property.property:
<property name="space" type="string" value="popup_menu_key"/> <property name="Up" type="string" value="move_window_up_key"/> <property name="Left" type="string" value="move_window_left_key"/>
<property name="Right" type="string" value="move_window_right_key"/>
<property name="Tab" type="string" value="switch_window_key"/>
<property name="Shift_R" type="string" value="maximize_window_key"/> <property name="Left" type="string" value="tile_left_key"/> <property name="Right" type="string" value="tile_right_key"/> <property name="d" type="string" value="show_desktop_key"/> <property name="m" type="string" value="hide_window_key"/> <property name="exclam" type="string" value="close_window_key"/> <property name="Tab" type="string" value="cycle_windows_key"/> <property name="Up" type="string" value="tile_up_key"/> <property name="Down" type="string" value="tile_down_key"/> <property name="asciitilde" type="string" value="resize_window_key"/> <property name="twosuperior" type="string" value="move_window_key"/>
